Which Kingdom Falls First? Player Name add GO! This Player Already Exists Skills: You must put a name there\.\.\. CurrentPlayerName Game needs at least 4 playes to start! Delete Player Already Exists Only two players, if one, this one will be attacked twice. SO, only one player, that might be a good thing, or not\.\.\. Select Theres just one player that you can attack, strange\.\.\. Select some player to attack! You can select 2 players! Ruins Jungle Castle Desert Yes No Cancel Accept Intel P.S. Stay quiet! You were Attacked! You won\'t take damage this phase. There\'s no players in your field, you might move to another. You might select someone! Attack Twice! You are in this field! During this phase, you wont take any damage You are able to move someone from your kingdom, do you want to? You might select someone\.\.\. Next! attack countered! You were attacked more than can counter\.\.\. You weren\'t able to counter that Attack! Waiting Player> Show WKFF? DamageStep Has died this turn. Has died, and was completly terminated by: No one died this turn.
